FuncDef: The display ip fib slot statistics command displays the total number of IPv4 FIB entries. The display ip fib slot statistics command displays the total number of IPv4 FIB entries.
CLIs: display ip fib slot <slot-id> [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] statistics
display ip fib slot <slot-id> cpuid <cpuid> [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 0 to 4 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the CPU ID.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885-LL (low latency mode), CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ip fib slot 1 cpuid 0 vpn-instance vpna statistics
